description: The `AWS::Redshift::ScheduledAction` resource creates an Amazon Redshift Scheduled Action.

ResizeClusterMessage.description: Describes a resize cluster operation. For example, a scheduled action to run the `ResizeCluster` API operation.

PauseClusterMessage.description: Describes a pause cluster operation. For example, a scheduled action to run the `PauseCluster` API operation.

ResumeClusterMessage.description: Describes a resume cluster operation. For example, a scheduled action to run the `ResumeCluster` API operation.

ScheduledActionName.description: The name of the scheduled action. The name must be unique within an account.
ScheduledActionName.markdownDescription:
The name of the scheduled action. The name must be unique within an account.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^(?=^[a-z][a-z0-9]*(-[a-z0-9]+)*$).{1,60}$  

Update requires: No interruption

TargetAction.description: A JSON format string of the Amazon Redshift API operation with input parameters.
